revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt Silver |image = [[File:Mt Silver.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Mt Silver. |tokens = 10,000 |location = On the west end of Route 28. }} '''Mt Silver''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 130,500 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Ponyta.png|40px]] Ponyta || colspan=2 rowspan=10|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Doduo.png|40px]] Doduo |- | [[File:Tangela.png|40px]] Tangela |- | [[File:Sneasel.png|40px]] Sneasel |- | [[File:Ursaring.png|40px]] Ursaring |- | [[File:Donphan.png|40px]] Donphan |- | [[File:Teddiursa.png|40px]] Teddiursa |- | [[File:Phanpy.png|40px]] Phanpy |- | [[File:Quagsire.png|40px]] Quagsire |- | [[File:Misdreavus.png|40px]] Misdreavus |- |}
